word_mean_info__list.difference: 指“财务的，金钱的，财政的，财力的”。
指与political“政治的”相对而言的“经济的”。
在名词前作形容词用，相当于economical，表“节约的”或“经济实惠的”。
指与“节约”同义的“经济”，含“节约，不浪费”之意。

word_group.brief_definition: 经济蓬勃发展；经济繁荣；急速发展的经济
黑市经济, 黑市经营, 地下经济活动
范围经济；范畴经济；纵深经济

bilingual.source: Political economy studies the relationship between government and economy.
bilingual.target: 政治经济学研究政府和经济之间的关系。

bilingual.source: Economists predict that the economy will grow next year.
bilingual.target: 经济学家们预测明年经济将增长。

bilingual.source: The economy's anemic growth has worried economists.
bilingual.target: 经济的缺乏活力的增长让经济学家担忧。

bilingual.source: The deutsche economy is one of the strongest in Europe.
bilingual.target: 德国的经济是欧洲最强的经济之一。

bilingual.source: Economists study the impact of seigniorage on the economy.
bilingual.target: 经济学家研究铸币税对经济的影响。

bilingual.source: Macroeconomics studies the overall functioning of an economy.
bilingual.target: 宏观经济学研究经济的整体运行。

bilingual.source: Macro-economics studies the behavior of the entire economy.
bilingual.target: 宏观经济学研究整个经济体的行为。
战前的经济正在蓬勃发展。

bilingual.source: Economic sanction can severely impact a country's economy.
bilingual.target: 经济制裁可以严重影响一个国家的经济。

list.abstract: economy，英语单词，有经济，经济情况，节俭，节约等意思。 economy，复数：economies，可数名词用于表示精打细算，例如， They will make economies by hiring fewer part-time workers. 他们将通过减少雇用兼职工人来节省开支。

yingyinNormal.en: We didn't run your economy into the ground. You did.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是我们把你们的经济搞砸的，是你自己。

yingyinNormal.en: Is not the digital economy, which I called data economy, and everything is going to be changed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不仅仅是数字经济，我叫它数据经济，所有的东西都会被改变。

yingyinNormal.en: The period between 1979 and 1982 was one of extreme turbulence, for the global economy, the markets, and for me. And I believed that the US economy, with the world economy tied to it, was headed toward a catastrophe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1979年到1982年这段时间都是充满颠簸的几年，对于国际经济市场和我来说。我那时相信美国经济，带着全球的经济，正向灾难方向发展。

yingyinNormal.en: Flight to D.C. Tonight. Couple of days there. Go. Coach. No extra legroom. Economy plus. Coach!
yingyinNormal.zh: 飞往华盛顿的机，今晚就走，在那儿待上几天。去吧，坐经济舱，不加空间。豪华经济舱。经济舱！

yingyinNormal.en: An economy is a tricky thing to control and governments are always trying to figure out how to do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 经济是管理起来十分棘手的系统，而政府总是能出掌控经济的办法。

yingyinNormal.en: And if that day comes, that day will (be) called D-economy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果这个结合实现，那才能被称作D经济。

yingyinNormal.en: But the gains of a growing economy aren't yet felt by everyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但经济发展的红利并不是每个人都能感受得到。

yingyinNormal.en: So far this year, our economy has created 2.65 million new jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今年以来，我们的经济已经创造了265万新的就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: Our economy had plummeted at a rate of 8% in a single quarter part of the fastest economic decline any time in the last half century.
yingyinNormal.zh: 近一个季度的时间经济就下滑8%，这是过去半个世纪以来少有的经济下滑速度。

yingyinNormal.en: Shoring up the economy, securing our nation from ICO and reducing unemployment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提振经济，保护我国不受哈里发国攻击还要降低失业率。

yingyinNormal.en: Independent experts said it would grow our economy, and shrink our deficits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 独立专家说这会促进我们的经济增长，能够减少我们的赤字。

yingyinNormal.en: A shootout beneath the beating heart of the American economy, and you don't know anything about it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在美国经济的心脏重地发生枪战，你居然一无所知？

yingyinNormal.en: It's been a major boost to our economy and a profound change to our auto industry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 成为了我们经济的巨大推动力量，并促进了我国汽车行业的深化改革。

yingyinNormal.en: So what is this thing you're working on? It's all to do with the rural economy. Very hush-hush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 话说回来，你这次来到底在忙什么?与乡村经济有关，非常机密。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks to the work we've all put in our economy has come a long way these past six years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多亏了我们所做的所有工作，我们的经济在过去的六年里有了长足的进展。

yingyinNormal.en: To build a stronger middle class in today's changing economy we've got to keep fighting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了在当今变革的经济形势中打造更强大的中产阶级，我们需要不断的斗争。

yingyinNormal.en: And that grows the economy for everyone. The bottom line is, America deserves a raise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而这也将促进经济增长惠及所有人。我们的底线就是，美国应该提高工资标准。

yingyinNormal.en: Along with our allies, we will support the people of Ukraine as they develop their democracy and economy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与我们的盟国一起，我们将支持乌克兰人民发展他们的民主和经济。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's do this because it would make our economy stronger and make sure that growth is shared.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们去这样做，因为这将让我们的经济更加壮大并确保这样的增长能够被分享。

yingyinNormal.en: Its economy is the largest on earth and it makes and exports more goods than anywhere else on the globe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国是地球上的最大的经济体，生产和出口的商品比全球其它任何地方都多。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 经济情况; 经济体制

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Despite graduating into the best <highlight>economy</highlight> in the past 50 years, Gen Zs know what an economic train wreck looks like.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管Z世代在毕业的时候遇见了过去50年最好的经济状况，但他们也知道经济崩盘是什么样子。

examination_example.sentence: Generation Zs are looking for more certainty and stability, because of the rise of the gig <highlight>economy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于零工经济的兴起，Z世代正在寻找更多的确定性和稳定性。

examination_example.sentence: For one thing, it is very slow compared to the pace of change within the digital <highlight>economy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一方面，与数字经济中的变化速度相比，它是非常缓慢的。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 它从根本上改变了该州的经济。

examination_example.sentence: That would become a familiar pattern of the boom-or-bust Texas <highlight>economy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将成为德克萨斯州经济繁荣或萧条的一个常见模式。

examination_example.sentence: Their cost to the nation's <highlight>economy</highlight> is incalculable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们给国家经济带来的损失是无法估量的。

examination_example.sentence: Now, Africa's largest <highlight>economy</highlight> is facing a food crisis as major tomato fields have been destroyed by an insect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，这个非洲最大的经济体正面临一场粮食危机，大量的番茄田被某昆虫摧毁。

examination_example.sentence: According to one study, each high school graduate contributes at least 500,000 dollars to the local <highlight>economy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一项研究，每个高中毕业生为当地经济贡献了至少50万美元。

examination_example.sentence: Stricter regulation is needed in transforming Glasgow's <highlight>economy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格拉斯哥的经济转型需要更严格的监管。

examination_example.sentence: Air pollution costs the global <highlight>economy</highlight> more than $5 trillion annually in welfare costs, with the most serious damage occurring in the developing world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 空气污染每年给全球经济造成超过5万亿美元的福利损失，其中最严重的损害发生在发展中国家。

sense_info_list.en: the use of the time; money; etc. that is available in a way that avoids waste

examination_example.sentence: So <highlight>economy</highlight> of the expression is foremost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以表达的经济性是最重要的。

word_family.mean: n. 经济；充分利用；节约；节省；经济结构；经济制度；经济情况；简洁；简练；钱财的节省

examination_example.sentence: Second, some areas where they live often face huge pressure to develop the local <highlight>economy</highlight> (经济), making them move to other areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二，他们生活的一些地区经常面临发展当地经济的巨大压力，使他们搬到其他地区。

examination_example.sentence: Science moves a country forward and benefits the <highlight>economy</highlight>,
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学推动一个国家前进，造福经济，

examination_example.sentence: Other people say that we should spend the money on teaching science, as this can move a country forward and benefit the <highlight>economy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他人说，我们应该把钱花在科学教学上，因为这可以推动一个国家向前发展，并有利于经济。

sample.mean: adj. 对生态环境友好的；不妨害生态环境的
n. 生态学者；生态学家
n. 生态学；生态（或环境）保护运动
n. 生态系统
n. 生态旅游

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 法则, 引申为“管理”, 表示"某一领域的知识"
